titleStmt.title: Poems with the Muses looking-glasse: and AmyntasÂ· By Thomas Randolph Master of Arts, and late fellow of Trinity Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Randolph, Thomas, 1605-1635.
Randolph, Robert, 1612 or 13-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield printer to the Vniversity, for Francis Bowman,

notesStmt.note: Edited by Robert Randolph, who signs the first introductory verse.
"The Muses looking-glasse" has separate dated title page, pagination, and register. "Amyntas" has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous.
Some copies were possibly issued with STC 20693.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
